title: WMSLayer layer
description: A layer object may allow overrides on popup content and drawing behavior for individual layers of a web service.

id.description: A unique identifying string for the layer.

legendUrl.description: A string URL to a legend graphic for the layer.

name.description: A string containing a unique name for the layer.

queryable.description: Boolean specifying whether a layer is queryable or not.

showPopup.description: Boolean specifying whether to display popup or not.

title.description: A user-friendly string title for the layer that can be used in a table of contents.
